original: Ahlström, Eric Rudolf, redaktör, Kinna, f. 25/8/96 i Ransäter, Värml. 1., av lokför. P. M. A. o. h. h. f. Sätterman. G. 28 m. Karin Peterson. Barn: Per-Eric f. 32, Lars-Gunnar 37, Lisbeth 41. — Res. d Danm. o. Norge und. ett fiert. år. Medarb. i Nya Werml.-Tidn. 21, i Karlst.-Tidn. 25-41, red. o. utg. av Norra Hall. Tidn. Vest-kusten 44, chef f. Borås Tidn. o. Westgöt. lok:red. i Kinna fr. 45. Stabsadj. o. stabskomp :chef v. Karlstads fo-stab 41-43. Ordf. i Kinna hö-gerfören. 46.
translated: Ahlström, Eric Rudolf, editor, Kinna, born August 25th, 1896 in Ransäter, Värmland. Firstborn of locomotive driver P. M. A. and his wife Sätterman. Married Karin Peterson in 1928. Children: Per-Eric born in 1932, Lars-Gunnar born in 1937, and Lisbeth born in 1941. Resided in Denmark and Norway for four years. Collaborator at Nya Werml.-Tidn. in 1921, at Karlst.-Tidn. from 1925 to 1941, editor and publisher of Norra Hall. Tidn. Vest-kusten in 1944, chief editor of Borås Tidn. and Westgöt. lok in Kinna from 1945. Staff adjutant and chief of staff at Karlstad's fo-stab from 1941 to 1943. Chairman of the Kinna right-wing association in 1946.
